AT.name: River City: Knights of Justice
AT.description: Das magische Land Riverandia ist in Aufruhr! Mehrere Jahre sind ins Land gezogen, seit der Regenbogen-Kristallturm plötzlich in Dunkelheit gehüllt wurde. Während die Welt in Horror und Chaos versank, verbreitete sich unter den Menschen jedoch eine Legende über einen Helden, der die Welt retten würde. Dann, eines Tages, erschien ein einsamer Ritter. Sein Name? Alexander Valford. Kunio und seine Freunde begeben sich in River City: Knights of Justice ins Mittelalter! In diesem ganz besonderen Teil der River City-Serie werden Kunio und seine Freunde und Feinde zu Helden und Bösewichtern aus einem Rollenspiel! Benutze Schwerter, Stäbe und sogar Magie, um Riverandia wieder Frieden zu bringen! Eigenschaften: • Mehrere Verbündete! • Über 100 Quests! • Geschichte mit zahlreichen Verzweigungen!

AU.name: River City: Knights of Justice
AU.description: The magical land of Riverandia is in a state of turmoil! Several years have passed since the rainbow-colored Crystal Tower was suddenly enveloped in darkness. With the world plunged into horror and chaos, a legend began to spread amongst the people about a savior who would come to save the world. Then, one day, a lone knight appeared. His name: Alexander Valford. Kunio and his friends go medieval in River City: Knights of Justice! This unique entry to the River City series sees Kunio and his friends and foes transformed into heroes and villains that would be at home in any RPG! Use swords, staves, and even magic to bring peace back to Riverandia! Featuring: • Multiple Allies! • Over 100 Quests! • Multiple Story Paths!

BG.name: River City: Knights of Justice
BG.description: The magical land of Riverandia is in a state of turmoil! Several years have passed since the rainbow-colored Crystal Tower was suddenly enveloped in darkness. With the world plunged into horror and chaos, a legend began to spread amongst the people about a savior who would come to save the world. Then, one day, a lone knight appeared. This unique entry to the River City series sees Kunio and his friends and foes transformed into heroes and villains that would be at home in any RPG! Use swords, staves, and even magic to bring peace back to Riverandia! Featuring: • Multiple Allies! • Over 100 Quests! • Multiple Story Paths!

BE.name: River City: Knights of Justice
BE.description: La contrée magique de Riverandia traverse une période de trouble. Plusieurs années se sont écoulées depuis que les ténèbres ont recouvert la Tour de Crystal arc-en-ciel. Tandis que le monde sombrait peu à peu dans l’horreur et le chaos, la légende d’un héros destiné à sauver le monde commença à se répandre. Jusqu’au jour où un chevalier solitaire apparut. Son nom : Alexander Valford. Kunio et ses amis sont plongés dans l’univers médiéval de River City: Knights of Justice ! Ce volet original de la série River City nous présente une version de Kunio et de ses amis et ennemis digne des héros et vilains de RPG ! À coups d’épées, de bâtons ou encore de magie, rétablis la paix à Riverandia ! Caractéristiques : • De multiples alliés ! • Plus de 100 quêtes ! • Plusieurs scénarios possibles !

ES.name: River City: Knights of Justice
ES.description: ¡La tierra mágica de Riverandia está en un estado de agitación! Han transcurrido varios años desde que la Torre de Cristal de color arcoíris sucumbiese a la oscuridad. Con el mundo sumido en el horror y el caos, una leyenda comenzó a difundirse entre la gente acerca de un salvador que vendría a salvar al mundo. Entonces, un día, apareció un caballero solitario. Su nombre: Alexander Valford. Kunio y sus amigos viajan a un mundo medieval en River City: Knights of Justice. Esta entrega única de la serie River City muestra a Kunio y sus amigos y enemigos transformados en héroes y villanos que se sentirían como en casa en cualquier RPG. Utiliza espadas, bastones e incluso magia para traer la paz de vuelta a Riverandia. Incluye: • ¡Múltiples aliados! • ¡Más de 100 misiones! • ¡Caminos que conducen a múltiples historias!

IT.name: River City: Knights of Justice
IT.description: La magica terra di Riverandia è in subbuglio! Sono trascorsi molti anni da quando le tenebre hanno avvolto la variopinta torre di cristallo gettando il mondo nell’orrore e nel caos. Col tempo, si è diffusa tra gli abitanti una leggenda preannunciante l’avvento di un salvatore. Un bel giorno, infatti, compare un cavaliere solitario. Il suo nome: Alexander Valford. Kunio e i suoi amici sbarcano nel medioevo in River City: Knights of Justice! In questo capitolo esclusivo della saga River City, Kunio e gli altri personaggi della serie si trasformano in eroi e cattivi degni dei migliori GDR! Usa spade, bastoni e arti magiche per riportare la pace a Riverandia! Caratteristiche: • Molteplici alleati! • Più di 100 missioni! • Molteplici trame!

NL.name: River City: Knights of Justice
NL.description: Het magische land Riverandia bevindt zich in een chaotische situatie! Het is al een aantal jaar geleden dat de regenboogkleurige Kristallen Toren plotseling in duisternis werd gehuld. Terwijl de wereld werd ondergedompeld in gruwel en chaos, verspreidde een legende zich onder de mensen over een redder die de wereld zou komen redden. Toen verscheen er op een dag een eenzame ridder. Zijn naam: Alexander Valford. Kunio en zijn vrienden gaan in River City: Knights of Justice terug naar de middeleeuwen! In dit unieke begin van de River City-serie worden Kunio en zijn vrienden en vijanden getransformeerd in helden en schurken die zich in elk rollenspel zouden thuis voelen! Gebruik zwaarden, staven en zelfs magie om de vrede terug te laten keren in Riverandia! Kenmerken: • Meerdere bondgenoten! • Meer dan 100 missies! • Verschillende verhaallijnen!

NZ.name: River City: Knights of Justice
NZ.description: The magical land of Riverandia is in a state of turmoil! Several years have passed since the rainbow-colored Crystal Tower was suddenly enveloped in darkness. With the world plunged into horror and chaos, a legend began to spread amongst the people about a savior who would come to save the world. Then, one day, a lone knight appeared. His name: Alexander Valford. Kunio and his friends go medieval in River City: Knights of Justice! This unique entry to the River City series sees Kunio and his friends and foes transformed into heroes and villains that would be at home in any RPG! PL.description: The magical land of Riverandia is in a state of turmoil! Several years have passed since the rainbow-colored Crystal Tower was suddenly enveloped in darkness. This unique entry to the River City series sees Kunio and his friends and foes transformed into heroes and villains that would be at home in any RPG! Use swords, staves, and even magic to bring peace back to Riverandia! Featuring: • Multiple Allies! • Over 100 Quests! • Multiple Story Paths!

PT.name: River City: Knights of Justice
PT.description: O reino mágico de Riverandia encontra-se num estado de grande agitação! Já passaram vários anos desde que a Crystal Tower arco-íris foi subitamente envolta pelas trevas. Com o mundo mergulhado no horror e no caos, começou a espalhar-se uma lenda pela população sobre um herói capaz de salvar o mundo. Foi então que, num certo dia, surgiu um cavaleiro solitário. O seu nome: Alexander Valford. Kunio e os seus amigos serão transportados para uma era medieval em River City: Knights of Justice! Este capítulo único da série River City transforma Kunio, assim como os seus amigos e rivais, em heróis e vilões capazes de protagonizar um RPG! Utiliza espadas, bastões e até magia para trazer a paz de volta a Riverandia! Destaques: • Vários aliados! • Mais de 100 missões! • História com múltiplas ramificações!

RU.name: River City: Knights of Justice
RU.description: В волшебной стране Riverandia воцарился хаос! С тех пор, как радужная Хрустальная башня внезапно погрузилась во тьму, прошло уже несколько лет. Когда ужас и хаос охватили весь мир, среди людей начала распространяться легенда о грядущем спасителе. И вот однажды на горизонте возник одинокий рыцарь. Его имя — Alexander Valford. В River City: Knights of Justice Kunio ждут средневековые приключения! Эта уникальная игра, знакомящая нас с серией игр River City, превращает Kunio, а также его друзей и врагов, в героев и злодеев, которые отлично впишутся в сюжет любой ролевой игры! Используйте мечи, посохи и даже магию, чтобы вернуть мир в Riverandia! Что есть в игре: • Множество союзников • Более 100 заданий • Различные сюжетные линии
